title: XP Boost
body: If i buy XP boost from the store it activates automaticly? (1 day XP boost)

replies.body:
Yes, boosts will be activated immediately upon purchase. You can check how many days, or how many wins, you have left on your active boosts from your profile overview.
https://i.imgur.com/xhBUAYG.png
*...and to think I got a 40 win boost at the same time as the 30 day boost*

Kokua covering the night shit while us poros were sleeping ^_^! 

Those boosts are indeed activated as soon as you buy them, so if you buy a 1 day xp boost be sure you're ready to grind games that day to make the most of it!
